entries.title: Netflix: Big hits help reverse subscriber losses
entries.description: The company added over 2.4 million subscribers, reversing losses earlier in the year.

entries.title: Meta ordered to sell Giphy by UK's competition watchdog CMA
entries.description: The social media giant says it is disappointed with the ruling but will accept it.

entries.title: Can artificial intelligence design your perfect perfume?
entries.description: Anna Holligan finds out whether artificial intelligence can create a unique fragrance just for her.
